(Delay caused by lack of sleep, lack of online time, visiting with an older 
brother, addiction to two computer games, and a lack of sleep and I was 
forced to miss a fun-looking TP @TLY, so I'm not in a good mood.  Just 
remembered, if all things go according to plan I'll be gone most of the day 
from this upcoming Tuesday to Friday, maybe more.  Then the week after that 
from Monday-Friday I'll be pretty much gone on vacation, though I'll still 
start the IGL.)

Scatterblaster/Vehement/Otyebis Staff/Teufel/Sun Crusher/Reflector:




Scatterblaster landed, unharmed from the recent engagement with Vehement and 
the obvious traitor Zardus.  Checking his rifle, he walked up to a hatch 
guarded by a few IGL soldiers.  They led him into the Otyebis, and towards 
another hatch with his name above.  He sighed.

"It says Scattershot.  My name is Scatterblaster."

"Shut up." one of the guards said, kicking Scatterblaster in thorugh the 
hatchway, shutting and locking it behind him.

---

Vehement landed on an opposite side of the ship as Scatterblaster, several 
guards escorting him to his arena without a word.

---

Several Otyebis soldiers carried a package to the arena Ultimo Campion was 
in, opening the hatch long enough to throw it in at Ultimo unrespectfully, 
shutting and locking it afterward.

===

Sun Crusher and Reflector soared into the general area of Teufel, flying in 
their biped modes.  They landed a few feet from the Zardus double, both 
seemingly unarmed but each was ready to exterminate if needed.

"Welcome, Sun Crusher and Reflector.  The Chaos-Bringer wishes us to locate 
some kind of Cybertronian pieces in this area.  Vehement was here, but he had 
to participate in the IGL.  Begin scanning from the air, I will scan from the 
ground."

Sun Crusher and Reflector looked to each other, engines powering them up and 
launching in the air as they acted out the will of Unicron.
